text: Five-year-old Xi Jinping (left) with younger brother Xi Yuanping (center) and father Xi Zhongxun (right) in 1958 Xi Yuanping (, born November 1956) is the younger brother of the current Communist Party of China General Secretary, Xi Jinping. He is currently the president of the International Energy Conservation and Environmental Protection Association. == References == Category:Xi Jinping family Category:Living people Category:1956 births
title: Xi Yuanping
